data.title: Women and Hollywood
data.meta_description: “Which one of them’s got blood on their hands?” a sarcastic Matthew Goode (“The Good Wife”) asks in Amazon Prime’s trailer for “Ordeal by Innocence.” Sandra Goldbacher’s (“Victoria”) adaptation of Agatha Christie’s most renowned work explores the answer to his question. Penned by Sarah Phelps (“The Witness for the Prosecution”), this three-part miniseries follows the...
data.text:
Educates, Advocates, and Agitates for Gender Diversity and Inclusion in Hollywood and the Global Film Industry
